results.name: Sababa Middle Eastern Cuisine
results.location: No. 17, Lane 283, Roosevelt Rd, Taipei City
results.description: Sababa Pita Bar is the first handcrafted pita specialty store in Taiwan. We only select the freshest top-quality ingredients and use authentic Middle Eastern family recipes.

results.name: Umeko Japanese Unagi House
results.location: No. 8, Lane 107, Linsen N Rd, Zhongshan District, Taipei City

results.name: Ziga Zaga
results.location: No. 2, Songshou Rd, Xinyi District, Taipei City
results.description: Ziga Zaga presents a wide range of classic Italian dishes made with top-notch ingredients and cooking techniques. Don't miss the must-try Lava Charcoal Oven Pizza and the open kitchen where Lobster Tomato Sauce Egg Silver Silk Noodles are made!

results.name: A Point Steak & Bar
results.location: 2F, No. 139, Section 5, Zhongxiao E Rd, Xinyi District, Taipei City 110
results.description: Starting from taste buds, rediscover the joy of deliciousness. A Point Steak & Bar carefully selects premium dishes and dares to innovate with new ideas. With a friendly and approachable style, we showcase the essence of exclusive culinary techniques that impress every discerning palate. Enjoy the tender and juicy Steak, savor the layered flavors of Pasta!

results.name: Gusto Pizza
results.location: No. 74, Lianyun St, Zhongzheng District, Taipei City
results.description: Our pizza master brings classic Italian pizza with a unique taste different from the norm to Taipei from London. Our pizza dough is fermented for at least 24 hours. We also bake bread and desserts in a kiln. However, pizza is the highlight of Gusto. Every dish we make is filled with rich flavors and aromas. In addition, we adhere to the traditional and handmade methods in our production.

results.name: WXYZ Bar
results.location: Shuangcheng St, Zhongshan District, Taipei City
results.description: Red Bar, Modern Creative Cuisine, Appetizer House. We provide vegan options, gluten-free choices, and vegetarian options.

results.name: Fika Fika Cafe
results.location: No. 33, Yitong St, Zhongshan District, Taipei City
results.description: We care about every customer, every drop of coffee sold, and every coffee bean. Today, Fika Fika Cafe Online Store hopes to share this wonderful experience with every customer who loves us, so that no matter where you are in the world, you can enjoy the beautiful time of Fika Fika with us.

results.name: Bravo Beer
results.location: No. 185, Section 4, Civic Blvd, Songshan District, Taipei City
results.description: What we hope to bring you is not just beer, but also food and a passion for life. The original meaning of Bravo in Italian is applause and praise. I thought if there was a place where everyone could easily taste fine wine and enjoy delicious food, that would be great! Because of this idea, combined with a passion for Belgian beer, Bravo Beer was born in 2006...
